featureSecondary: This is a browser extension that allows you to block text or elements you don't want to see on any web site.
feature1ContentMain: and EmoGuard will block the target text or elements on the web page.
feature2ContentMain: to control how it is hidden.
feature3ContentMain: across browsers and devices using Dropbox.
demoComment1: This is a demo of EmoGuard. Try pressing the block button!
demoComment2: You can block just the text...
demoComment3: You can also block entire sentences by selecting "Element"!
reasonSecondary: Why use EmoGuard? Here are some great reasons.
reason1Content: There are all kinds of people in the world. You can't change them, but you can control the information on the web pages you view with EmoGuard.
reason2Content: Spoilers sneak up on you like assassins and suddenly appear. Don't worry anymore, you can prevent it by adding the relevant words to EmoGuard.
reason3Content: Once people feel bad, they spend their time on distractions. So save your emotions with EmoGuard and use your precious time for what matters.
authSucceededGuide: Please return to the EmoGuard options page and enter the following authorization code.
authFailedGuide: The required authorization code could not be obtained. Please start over.
planPrimary: Free for desktop, paid for mobile
planSecondary: Peace of mind can be obtained for the cost of a cup of coffee ‚òï
pricingSecondary: Edit keywords and CSS selectors freely
mobilePricingPrimary: Unlimited access on iOS and iPadOS
